metadata.description: Base URL for Template Files
OpenShift Master VM size
OpenShift Node VM(s) size
OpenShift cluster prefix.  Used to generate master, infra and node hostnames.  Maximum of 5 characters.

OpenShift Master Load Balancer public IP DNS name (hostname portion). Must be lowercase. It should match with the following regular expression: ^[a-z][a-z0-9-]{1,61}[a-z0-9]$ or it will raise an error.

OpenShift Infra Nodes Load Balancer public IP DNS name (hostname portion). Must be lowercase. It should match with the following regular expression: ^[a-z][a-z0-9-]{1,61}[a-z0-9]$ or it will raise an error.
Number of OpenShift masters.  1 is non HA and 3 is for HA
Number of OpenShift nodes
Size of Datadisk in GB for Docker volume
Administrator username on all VMs and first user created for OpenShift login
Password for OpenShift user to login to OpenShift Console
Red Hat Cloud Access Username (login credentials for access.redhat.com)
Cloud Access password (login credentials for access.redhat.com)
Pool ID with OpenShift entitlements (To find it, run on registered server: subscription-manager list)
SSH public key for all VMs
Resource Group that contains the Key Vault
Name of the Key Vault
Key Vault Secret Name that contains the Private Key
Default Subdomain type - xip.io or custom (defined in next parameter)
Default Subdomain for application routing (Wildcard DNS) - must enter something even if you are using xip.io

protectedSettings.commandToExecute: [concat('bash ', variables('bastionPrepScriptFileName'), ' ', parameters('cloudAccessUsername'), ' ', variables('singlequote'), parameters('cloudAccessPassword'), variables('singlequote'), ' ', parameters('cloudAccessPoolId'))]
